abstract: Ron Paul on Monday announced a plan to cut $1 trillion from federal spending in a single year, drastically reducing the size and scope of government, if he is elected president.
snippet: Ron Paul on Monday announced a plan to cut $1 trillion from federal spending in a single year, drastically reducing the size and scope of government, if he is elected president.

headline.main: Paul Plan Would Eliminate Cabinet Departments to Cut $1 Trillion
